2016.tpci.meloetta.bundle.3: Meloetta brings both brains and brawn: if this Fighting-type Pokémon has Psychic Energy attached, its Prima Rondo attack does 110 damage! This rare Holo card also comes with two 10-card booster packs from the Pokémon TCG: XY—Fates Collide expansion!
2016.tpci.meloetta.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 1 foil Meloetta Pokémon card (XY—BREAKthrough, 85/162) 2 Pokémon TCG: XY—Fates Collide booster packs (10-card) These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through August 01, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
tpci.product.20th.meloetta.sleeve.name: Generations Meloetta Card Sleeves
